projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.description: Here are a selection of solo projects I've worked on over the past few years, each with its source code available on GitHub. Some of them are live and deployed!

data.name: Geo Visualizer
data.description: This project was designed in Adobe XD and developed using React, Strapi and MonogDB. It helps users to look for locations more efficiently and elegantly.

data.name: Old Portfolio
data.description: This is an old version of my portfolio, made solely using HTML, SASS and Vanilla JavaScript.

data.name: Sterling Hotels
data.description: This is a mock website for Sterling Hotels. The UI is developed using pure HTML and SASS. It has various hover effects throughout the website.

data.name: Explore Inside Photography
data.description: This is a small portfolio website for a photographer. It has working contact form using realtime database of google firebase.

data.name: Covid-19 Tracker
data.description: This website was created to track the last pandemic event Covid-19. It is developed in React and open source API is used to get the data.

artWorks.title: Art Works
artWorks.description: The following digital arts are created in Blender3D and Inkscape. I also have an art portfolio in Behance.

photos.title: What I do as Hobby?
photos.description: Beyond my role as a developer, I'm a passionate traveler, and my camera is an ever-present companion on my journeys. With my reliable DSLR, the Nikon D3300, and the versatile Fujifilm X-S20, I've seized countless breathtaking moments during my adventures.
